### Binary Search

```{python}
def bin_search(list, target):
    first = 0
    last = len(list)-1
    
    while first <= last:
        midpoint = (first + last)//2
        print(first, last, midpoint, target)
        
        if list[midpoint] == target:
            return midpoint
        elif list[midpoint] > target:
            last = midpoint - 1
        else:
            first = midpoint + 1
            
    return None
```

```{python}
listA = [x for x in range(5,10)]
```

```{python}
pos = bin_search(listA, 2)
```

```{python}
pos
```

tightened version

```{python}
def eval_mid(first, last, list, target):

    midpoint = (first + last)//2

    print(first, last, midpoint, list[midpoint], target)

    if list[midpoint] == target:
        return midpoint

    elif list[midpoint] > target:
        return eval_mid(first, midpoint - 1, list, target)

    elif list[midpoint] < target:
        return eval_mid(midpoint + 1, last, list, target)

    elif first > last:
        return None

def rec_bin_search(list, target):
    
    first = 0
    last = len(list)-1
    pos = eval_mid(first, last, list, target)
    return pos
    
```

```{python}
pos = rec_bin_search(listA, 5)
```
